name: Brain Games:OMG!
description:
Do you know your IQ score? Who is the smartest, you or your friends?
Try Brain Games, which tells you who the smartest person is.

Brain Games is a new addictive free-wheeling puzzle game that challenges your mind with a series of tricky Brain teasers and different riddle tests. Conventional thinking can't complete the challenge.

These fun, creative, and challenging puzzles will push your limits.

You'll have to think outside the box (and right off the screen) to come out on top!
Playful pictures and mind-blowing brain teasers will keep you coming back for more...
